.
Language to Include in the Development Letter if the Applicant Requested Substitution and It Is Granted
Use the following language if the applicant requested substitution and it is granted by VA:
As mentioned in a previous letter, we have granted the request for substitution
.  The request for substitution allows you to submit additional evidence in support of the pending
[
insert claim or appeal]
to determine your entitlement to
[insert the word “additional” if some accrued benefits have been paid]
accrued benefits.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C  - Development for Accrued and Requests for Substitution
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C
